column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/1ad0c9002573d498dbc8f81961d40ae459e6e93c for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
miner_tests.cpp shouldn't need wallet.h at all\n
Why are we including db.h in net.cpp? Sure this is needed at all?\n
